Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±32.65 acres available

5.8 miles to I-15 via US 93
Zoned M-2 (City of North Las Vegas)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Apex Power Parkway. 5.8 miles to I-15 via US 93. I-15 & US-93.

I-15 & US-93 GARNETT INTERCHANGE ENHANCEMENT PROJECT COMPLETE

At the beginning of 2018, NDOT began construction on a $58 million interchange enhancement project at the I-15 & US-93 Garnett interchange. This project will improve safety and mobility for both the I-15 & US-93 Highways. The project will also widen US-93 from a two-lane highway to a four-lane divided highway for five miles which will extend from the Garnet Interchange to just north of Apex Power Parkway.  www.nevadadot.com/projects-programs/road-projects/i-15-u-s-93-garnet-interchange-u-s-93-capacity-improvements

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: ±32.65 acres available. Frontage on Apex Power Parkway. 5.8 miles to I-15 via US 93. Current zoning M-2 (City of North Las Vegas).

address.Common.Line1: 10-acre Development Site on the Las Vegas Strip

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: 10-acre Development Site on the Las Vegas Strip

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: 10-acre Development Site on the Las Vegas Strip

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: 10-acre Development Site on the Las Vegas Strip

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to present the exclusive opportunity to acquire
a ±10-acre development site on the world-famous Las Vegas
Strip. The property is on the former site of the Riviera Hotel
Casino, adjacent to the Las Vegas Convention Center District
(“LVCCD”) expansion project. With 611 feet of frontage on Las
Vegas Boulevard, a developer has the ability to change the sky
line of the north end of the Strip. The site is surrounded by
approximately $8 billion of new development activity, including the
1.4 million sq. ft. LVCCD expansion project to the east, Genting’s
Resorts World Project to the west and The Drew Las Vegas (former
Fontainebleau) directly to the north.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the east side of Las Vegas Blvd directly across from the Mandalay Bay.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase ±17.71 acres of land on S. Las Vegas Boulevard at a significant price reduction. The property is located just east of the Mandalay Bay (Four Seasons Hotel) Resort and Casino. The world-famous “Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas” sign is located south of the property. The Raiders Stadium is less than a mile west of the site along Russell Rd. The site lends itself to several potential uses, including the development of multi-family, hotel, casino, and retail. The subject property is a tremendous opportunity for an investor or developer to capitalize on future development with an attractive acquisition cost.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ±17.71 Acres of Las Vegas Strip Opportunity Zone Land

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Prime location with significant daytime and nighttime traffic from both locals and tourists resulting in +/-94,500 CPD, making it one of the busiest intersections in Las Vegas
Less than 1/2 mile from the I-15 interchange
Long-term economic & tourism growth

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located along Spring Mountain Road at I-15 to Rainbow Blvd, this +/-3.5-mile stretch offers an exciting entertainment, shopping and dining destination for both locals and tourists. Known as Las Vegas Chinatown (Asian District), the area continues to grow with several recent retail developments such as Shanghai Plaza and Golden Spring Plaza including multi-family projects, Green Leaf Lotus and Jade.

Chinatown (Asian District) visitors will find five Asian grocers, over 150 restaurants offering authentic Chinese and various Asian ethnic cuisines including affordable and upscale options, experiential retail, and entertainment. 

AREA HIGHLIGHTS

Lack of new development with continued demand
Outperforms other submarkets. 4% retail vacancy
Above market retail rental rates as high as $5.00 PSF/month

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to offer the exclusive opportunity to purchase ±12.58 acres located near the Las Vegas Strip just west of the I-15 freeway interchange at Spring Mountain Road. The immediate surrounding area is complemented by resort destinations such as Wynn, Encore, Venetian, Palazzo, the new Resorts World Las Vegas, and Fashion Show Mall with anchors like Neiman Marcus, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue and Dick’s Sporting Goods.  

In addition, the property is situated at the entrance into the Las Vegas Chinatown/Asian District, an area that has seen tremendous recent growth with popular dining, shopping, experiential retail entertainment such as Area 15, Club Wyndham Desert Blue Resort and multi-family developments like Green Leaf Lotus and Jade apartments. The property is subject to numerous short-term leases providing cash-flow while the property undergoes the entitlement and re-development process.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located just east of the southeast corner of Sahara Avenue and Decatur Boulevard.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Zoned General Commercial (C-2)

Three existing buildings totaling 29,960 SF include:
     - 9,920 SF Main Showroom
     - 13,260 SF Body Shop
     - 6,780 SF Storage Building

High traffic counts!
     - West Sahara Avenue: 37,500 Cars Per Day
     - South Decatur Boulevard: 45,500 Cars Per Day

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the Southeast corner of Raleigh Lane and Betty Ridge Road. Less than 5 minutes from Creed Air Force Base and Terrible Herbst Casino. Indian Springs is located off U.S. Highway 95 and is ±41 miles from downtown Las Vegas, Nevada and 20 minutes from Skye Canyon. It is home to Creech Air Force Base and the Nevada National Guard Armory & Training Course (in planning). There is a middle/high school, highway patrol, a US Post Office, 2 churches and a Library located in Indian Springs. There is also a public park on 86 acres, which includes seventeen sporting and recreational venues (tennis, swimming, softball, baseball, basketball, skate boarding, football, track, playgrounds, picnic areas, and a natural lake).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Owner will carry! 295 Raleigh Lane is ±14.31 Acres Residential/Transitional zoned land in the heart of Indian Springs with close proximity to the US-95 Freeway, Creed Air Force Base, the Brand New Terrible Herbst Casino and is 20 minutes North of the Skye Canyon Master Planned Community in Las Vegas. This site is perfect for new Residential Housing, Apartments or a Mobile Home Park. The site is surrounded by brand new amenities, with convenient access to the US-95 Freeway. Located ±41 miles North of the Las Vegas Strip, Downtown Las Vegas and McCarran International Airport.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Zoning:  C, with many allowable uses
Near level topography

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Strategically located on Highway 50 near the planned extension of Nevada Pacific Parkway,  Fernley is located 28 miles east of the Reno/Sparks area and 60 miles from Lake Tahoe.  It is a distribution and transportation hub with Highway 95A, Interstate 80 and Highway 50 roadway system converging and  Union Pacific and Burlington Northern Santa Fe railway systems operating to have transportation systems reaching major western markets within a day.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: A commercially zoned parcel in Fernley's New Master Plan (adopted 3/20) with many allowable uses under the C zoning.  With Nevada's advantageous tax structure, there are NO corporate, personal income, unitary or inventory taxes.  Fernley also qualifies as a Foreign Trade Zone.  With a population expected to increase 30% or more by 2025, it's one of the fastest growing areas in the USA.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Fronts I 80 on Southern Property Line, Northern Boundry fronts Mission Way, Great Visibility and Signage

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This 12.05 Acres of commercial land for sale along Interstate 80, which is adjacent to Fernley's primary commercial trade area. This site is the second parcel off of I 80 interchange, and includes 561 feet of frontage along I 80 with superior visibility. The site offers great signage opportunity.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located bout 28 miles east of the Reno/Sparks area and 60 miles from Lake Tahoe, it is at the convergence of three major arteries:  Highway 95A, Interstate 80 and Highway 50.  Fernley is a distribution and transportation hub with a highway and
railway system employing the Union Pacific Railroad’s main line and
Burlington Northern Santa Fe rail that reaches major western markets
within a day and is 30 minutes from the Reno-Tahoe International
Airport.  Fernley is one of the fastest growing areas in the USA according to the Nevada State Demographer and holds firmly to its blue collar, agricultural,
ranching and mining roots, while embracing some of the most innovative manufacturing and clean energy industries.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This ±5 acre parcel is located adjacent to U.S. 95 south of downtown Fernley.  The property fronts Jenny’s Lane with frontage on Farm District Road.  Previously proposed have been a C-Store and neighborhood shopping center. Close to schools and several residential neighborhoods. Property is improved with pads and parking lot. This is a great opportunity to own and develop a prime commercial parcel.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Zoned C-2

Minutes from Google, Apple, Tesla, Polaris, Panasonic, et al

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the business friendly, no-tax state of Nevada, Fernley is recognized for its rail, fiber, trucking, manufacturing, low cost interstate power and highway networks and it is a central hub with ability to serve 60 million people.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Adjacent to the Crossroads Commerce Center Industrial Park, level land, with excellent highway visibility and access, 15 minutes east of the Tahoe Reno Industrial Center with companies such as Tesla, Apple and Google.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The subject site as well as the entire industrial park is included in an Opportunity Zone as well as a Foregin Trade Zone. Other attributes specific to the site include no corporate income tax.
